dublin_core.dcvalue: We designed a special course based on Service Learning theory to train the undergraduate students to teach the elderly people in community college to learn using smartphones for health A 2 credit course was designed composed of lecture Andamp discussion and community service 20 undergrduate stundents from university and 26 seniors from community college registered at this course The results show very postitive impacts in both groups The students felt doing something meaningful and learning helping the elder when the elderly felt very appreciated by being served and taught by students about the smartphones The elderly wished us to go back in the future
